title: Паніка Вова
overview: A popular (in the past) actor, acting as a detective, Volodymyr Boiko becomes a hostage of circumstances and really becomes a detective - no longer on screen. In the investigations, he is helped by a longtime acquaintance, Nick, who is well versed in computer technology. Unraveling one thing, the couple takes on the other - complex, serious challenges, often even murders.
